description.plain: YFN Lucci was born and raised in Atlanta, Georgia. Lucci discovered his musical talent at age 16. In 2014, Lucci got signed to TIG Records.

body.plain: YFN Lucci was born and raised in Atlanta, Georgia. Lucci discovered his musical talent at age 16. In 2014, Lucci got signed to TIG Records.

Everywhere we go we eat steak

Most of with me probably tryna beat a case

Yeah, know we ridin' K everyday

You know

I need me a Nicki Minaj, I need me like two freaky broads

I swear I really got rich in the hallway

Then my mother lost her mother, then my grandma lost her mother, then I fucked around and lost my cousin

Shit fucked a whole bunch of money yeah

Power like a mason, mason

The way we was raised up we might take some
You know a nigga love gettin' paper
This a real nigga celebration

Yeahh, yeah

You know we done been through so much you can't stop us
You know

True story, this is my story

songs.full_title: Wet (She Got That…) by YFN Lucci
songs.title: Wet (She Got That…)

description.plain:
“Wet (She Got That…)” is the lead single to YFN Lucci’s 2020 project Wish Me Well 3. In the track, Atlanta rapper raps about his interest in an individual. He also name drops a number of luxury fashion and car brands.

This track is also remixed by the female rapper Mulatto, who’s from Ohio.

songs.embed_content: Read “Wet (She Got That…)” by YFN Lucci on Genius

album.full_title: Wish Me Well 3 by YFN Lucci
album.name: Wish Me Well 3
